net.antidot.api.search
Class IntervalFacetValueHelper

java.lang.Object
  net.antidot.api.search.IntervalFacetValueHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
FacetValueHelperInterface
public class IntervalFacetValueHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements FacetValueHelperInterface

Represents one value of interval facet.

You can get access to main data such as:

  • key used to filter on specific facet value,
  • label for better integration than simple key,
  • count of documents defining the facet value,
  • sub-facet values for hierarchical facets.

Constructor Detail

IntervalFacetValueHelper

public IntervalFacetValueHelper(Interval interval)
Constructs new value helper. You should never call this constructor directly. Instances of this class are constructed when necessary while querying FacetHelper.getValues().

Parameters:
interval - [in] Google protobuf used to initialize this instance.
Method Detail

getKey

public java.lang.String getKey()
Description copied from interface: FacetValueHelperInterface
Retrieves key of the facet value. This key is used to filter on this specific facet value.

Specified by:
getKey in interface FacetValueHelperInterface
Returns:
key of the facet value.

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel()
Description copied from interface: FacetValueHelperInterface
Retrieves label of the facet value. This label can be used instead of the key for a better web integration.

If no label has been defined on PaF side, this method should return same result as FacetValueHelperInterface.getKey() method.

Specified by:
getLabel in interface FacetValueHelperInterface
Returns:
label of the facet value.
